data.title: FHSAA Office Directory - Florida High School Athletic Association
data.meta_description: FHSAA Office Directory - Florida High School Athletic Association
data.text: FHSAA Office Directory To telephone the FHSAA Office, dial (352) 372-9551. Once your call is answered by the automated attendant main menu, press the extension of the individual with whom you wish to speak. Administrative Staff Cristina Broska Director of Athletics Responsibilities: Administrator for girls soccer, swimming & diving, baseball; district coordinators; Coaches and Officials Advisory Committee elections; intern coordinator Ph: ext. 250 Fx: (352) 244-5055 cbroska@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Sheila Gallino, ext. 360 sgallino@fhsaa.org Michael Colby, CMAA Director of Eligibility Responsibilities: Governance elections; Representative Assembly coordinator; handbook revision; home education and foreign exchange/ international students; general eligibility questions Phone: ext. 380 Fx: (352) 244-0232 mcolby@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Jordanne Stark, ext. 340 jstark@fhsaa.org Dr. Roger Dearing Executive Director Responsibilities: Chief Executive Officer; supervision of FHSAA staff and office operations; interpretation of bylaws, guidelines, regulations, policies and procedures; corporate sponsorships Ph: ext. 110 Fx: (352) 244-5047 rdearing@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Carolyn Matheny, ext. 110 cmatheny@fhsaa.org Quinten Ershock Marketing Specialist Responsibilities: Corporate sponsorship programs; Liaison with corporate sponsors; Establish sponsorship package levels and review proposals; Coordination of sponsor radio, TV and print advertising; FHSAA logo and marks; State Series championship programs Ph: ext. 190 Fx: (352) 333-2191 qershock@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Carlene Piliero, ext. 170 cpiliero@fhsaa.org Justin Harrison Assistant Executive Director for Athletic Services Responsibilities: Oversees Athletic Services department; Supervisor of officials program; Unsportsmanlike conduct of athletes and coaches; Contractual disputes between member schools; State series passes and administrator; Appeals of fines and penalties assessed for violations of athletic regulations Phone: ext. 180 Fx: (352) 244-5043 jharrison@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Colette Walinski, ext. 300 cwalinski@fhsaa.org –– 1 –– Michael Herchel Network Administrator Responsibilities: Systems/network administrator; C2Cschools.com support; online rules presentation maintenance; officials program Ph: ext. 120 Fax: (352) 373-1528 mherchel@fhsaa.org Jana Horton Officials Registrar Responsibilities: Officials registration and payments; officials association sanctions; officials technical support for rules videos and exams; distribution of National Federation books and study materials to contest officials; field clinics; officials service awards; officials state series passes Ph: ext. 290 Fax: (352) 244-0320 jhorton@fhsaa.org Harvard Jones Assistant Director of Athletics Responsibilities: Administrator for girls basketball, bowling, boys volleyball, flag football; middle school sports administrator Ph: ext. 450 Fx: (352) 333-2103 hjones@fhsaa.org Dr. Peggy Jones Associate Executive Director for Administrative Services Responsibilities: Oversees marketing, public relations, membership services, network administration departments; C2CSchools. com administration; school self reports; pubic records requests Ph: ext. 270 Fx: (352) 244-5046 pjones@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Carlene Piliero, ext. 170 cpiliero@fhsaa.org Dale Klaus Director of Athletics Responsibilities: Administrator for golf, wrestling, boys weightlifting, water polo, softball; Athletic Directors Advisory Committee Phone: ext. 390 Fx: (352) 244-5052 dklaus@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Will Adams, ext. 460 wadams@fhsaa.org Alex Ozuna Assistant Director of Athletics Responsibilities: Administrator for cross country, boys soccer, lacrosse Ph: ext. 450 Fx: (352) 333-2193 aozuna@fhsaa.org Gary Pigott Senior Director of Athletics Responsibilities: Administrator for girls volleyball, boys basketball, tennis; classifications and districts; drop/add sports; Sports Medicine Advisory Committee; NFHS Coaches Recognition Program; intern coordinator Ph: ext. 260 Fx: (352) 244-5042 gpigott@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Will Adams, ext. 460 wadams@fhsaa.org
